headline: 'THINK I'M BLUFFING?': AZ Gov Candidate Lake Says, 'I'm Declaring an Invasion and Finishing Trump's Wall'
sentences:
We’re going to send our troops down to the border —the Arizona National Guard Troops —we’re going to arm them and allow them to arrest and detain people until we process them and send them back over the border.”
“It’s pretty simple — you protect your people…and right now our government’s failing on that.”
Watch the clip above.

Arizona gubernatorial candidate Kari Lake spoke with Just The News about her plans to stop the record-breaking influx of illegal migrant border crossings; Lake says, “it’s pretty simple —you protect your people.”
“We can protect our own border —the Constitution allows that.
When I become Governor, I will send armed National Guard Troops to the border to arrest & detain Illegal Aliens invading Arizona — then we will send them back.

It’s a dereliction of duty on Joe Biden’s part….So we’re going to take it into our own hands.”
“We’re going to finish President Trump’s wall.
Of course Article 4, Section 4 of the Constitution, the guarantee clause, requires that the federal government protect us from invasion.

pic.twitter.com/DV9xYRujxZ
— Kari Lake for AZ Governor (@KariLake) March 31, 2022
On day one, I will issue a declaration of invasion.
But they are not doin that.
